title: [Solhaven, The Crooked Way]
description: Mist trails from somewhere to the northwest, and the area is unusually dark, even the faint beams of pale moonlight drifting in from between the closely-spaced buildings seem diminished by the gloom.  Faint scurrying sounds echo in the shadows, accompanied by the soft pattering sounds of dripping water.

Mist trails from somewhere to the northwest, and the area is unusually dark, even the faint beams of sunlight streaming in from between the closely-spaced buildings seem diminished by the gloom.  Faint scurrying sounds echo in the shadows, accompanied by the soft pattering sounds of dripping water.
